dict.acceptation: 一周一次的[地]，每周的；周刊的；

sent.orig: Periodical follow up on the management trainee progress (weekly, bi-weekly, monthly, etc. ).
sent.trans: 定期维护跟踪储备经理培训进展。

sent.orig: Its coat needs brushing or combing twice weekly.
sent.trans: 他们每周需要梳理毛发两次。

sent.orig: Replenish with flour and water weekly.
sent.trans: 每星期要取出加水和面粉喂养。

sent.orig: Us Weekly, citing an unnamed family source, said the child was a boy.
sent.trans: 《美国周刊》则称，消息来自布兰妮的一位未透露姓名的亲戚，并指出孩子是个男孩。

sent.orig: Prepare weekly cash position report and monthly bank reconciliation for management review.
sent.trans: 制作周现金流报告和月银行往来对帐报告供管理层参考。
